thread.title: Wyndham® Extra Holidays Offers "Trick-or-Treat" Travel Deals This Halloween
thread.title_full: Wyndham® Extra Holidays Offers "Trick-or-Treat" Travel Deals This Halloween - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Wyndham® Extra Holidays Offers "Trick-or-Treat" Travel Deals This Halloween
text:
Wyndham Extra Holidays
Save up to 30% and Enjoy Halloween Activities in Popular Destinations across the U.S.
ORLANDO, Fla. , Oct. 15, Wyndham ® Extra Holidays , a subsidiary of Wyndham Vacation Ownership (WVO), the world's largest vacation ownership company and member of the Wyndham Worldwide family of companies (NYSE: WYN), is celebrating Halloween this fall by offering special "trick-or-treat" travel deals to more than 35 destinations where you can join in hair-raising Halloween fun at various events across the U.S. Travelers can stay in spacious condo-style suites most complete with all the comforts of home: fully equipped kitchens, expansive private bedrooms, as well as separate dining and living areas.
Fun-filled activities await you in and around resorts offered by Wyndham ® Extra Holidays , including special tours at the historic 1830s Ashley House adjacent to the Avenue Plaza Resort in New Orleans , where people say that ghostly Civil War spirits, an ethereal woman, and a phantom pianist are all present. Guests can attend tours of the Ashley House from October 26 -31, where psychic and spiritual medium Dr. Dave Hanson will be on-site to lead this year's Halloween events. You may even witness the lights flicker or the doors close by themselves as others have reported.
Take advantage of special deals of up to 30 percent off at popular destinations across the U.S. including the resorts featured below.
New Orleans, Louisiana - Avenue Plaza Resort
Stay in the picturesque Garden District off St. Charles Avenue in the heart of the Big Easy minutes from the French Quarter. Take your pick from a studio or one-bedroom suite with kitchen amenities and enjoy fantastic resort amenities including the on-site restaurant, outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, fitness center, rooftop terrace, and Dr. Dave's tours of the haunted Ashley House next door. New Orleans is the host of an array of Halloween activities including the 19 th Annual Halloween Parade, Voodoo Fest, historic cemetery tours and lots of spine tingling events in the French Quarter.
Las Vegas, Nevada - Desert Rose Resort
Escape to a quiet desert oasis less than two blocks off the vibrant Las Vegas Strip, just south of the MGM Grand Casino and a short walk to the monorail station. Stay in spacious one- and two-bedroom suites with private bedrooms, living/dining areas, and kitchens. Enjoy the resort's sparkling pool surrounded by dense tropical plants in this desert paradise. Enjoy a variety of Halloween events including the Fremont Street FrightFest, Moapa Valley Corn Maze, Bonnie Screams Haunted House and a wide selection of parties and A-list performances throughout Las Vegas .
Bend, Oregon - WorldMark Bend – Seventh Mountain Resort
Ride the trails at the equestrian center on-site, try the hiking and mountain biking trails of the Cascade Mountains, and fly fishing on the Deschutes River. After all the action, relax in one- or two- bedroom suites with kitchens and balconies or have a swim in one of the two heated pools. The Bend area hosts of an array of Halloween activities including the Central Oregon Pumpkin Patch Maze, Old Mill District Halloween Party and the Zombie Run.
Orlando, Florida - Wyndham Bonnet Creek Resort
Escape to this Mediterranean resort featuring one- and two-bedroom family suites with all the amenities of home adjacent to Walt Disney World ® Resort. This European-inspired retreat features two lazy rivers, five pools, mini golf and fun resort activities programs for everyone in the family. Orlando is the host of a wide selection of Halloween activities including SeaWorld's Halloween Spooktacular ® , Universal Orlando's Halloween Horror Nights ® and Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party at the Magic Kingdom ® park.
Book now at www.ExtraHolidays.com/Fall or call 800-670-3620 and mention code FALL15. Book by October 31, 2015 . Travel by November 24, 2015 . Two-night minimum stay required. Valid for new reservations only. Reservations subject to availability. Reservations not valid over holidays and special events. Cannot be combined with any other offer. All monetary amounts are noted in U.S. Dollars unless otherwise noted. Fla. Seller of Travel Reg. No. ST-35519.
About Wyndham ® Extra Holidays
Wyndham ® Extra Holidays specializes in offering quality vacation accommodations throughout the United States , including Hawaii , the U.S. Virgin Islands , Canada , Mexico , Fiji and Puerto Rico . Wyndham ® Extra Holidays is a specialized provider of rental vacation accommodations and a part of Wyndham Vacation Ownership, which is headquartered in Orlando, Fla. A subsidiary of Wyndham Worldwide , Wyndham Vacation Ownership is the world's largest vacation ownership business, as measured by the number of vacation ownership resorts, individual vacation ownership units and owners of vacation ownership interests.
